title: ‘My Body Worked Against Me’: Demi Vollering Hits Reset After Liège in Vuelta Title Defense
content:
The Dutch superstar revealed her menstrual cycle held her back from racing at full strength: 'I am a woman, sometimes you suffer with your hormones.'

Read the full article at ‘My Body Worked Against Me’: Demi Vollering Hits Reset After Liège in Vuelta Title Defense on Velo.
author: ahood
